meanings.definition: シラ書 (旧約聖書続編の一つ)
meanings.english_definition: A book of the Old Testament Apocrypha, also known as the Book of Ecclesiasticus.

examples.sentence: I was reading from Sirach this morning.
examples.translation: 今朝、シラ書を読んでいました。

synonyms: Wisdom of Jesus the Son of Sirach

etymology.value: Named after its author, Jesus son of Sirach.
